title: IGIMS Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for 06 Senior Resident Posts
description: The Indira Gandhi Institute of Medical Sciences (IGIMS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06 Senior Resident Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MDS can apply for the IGIMS Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, applica...
